plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion English CFBundleExecutable ${EXECUTABLE_NAME} CFBundleIconFile GrabBox2
CFBundleIdentifier #if defined(MAC_APP_STORE) com.bitspatter.grabbox2 #else com.bitspatter.mac.grabbox2 #endif
CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName ${PRODUCT_NAME} CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleSignature ????
#if defined(MAC_APP_STORE) CFBundleShortVersionString 1.0 CFBundleVersion 1.0 #else CFBundleShortVersionString 0.3.0 CFBundleVersion 0.3.0 #endif
LSMinimumSystemVersion #if defined(MAC_APP_STORE) 10.6.6 #else ${MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET} #endif
CFBundleURLTypes
CFBundleURLName GrabBox2/Dropbox Integration URL CFBundleURLSchemes
db-
LSApplicationCategoryType public.app-category.utilities
LSUIElement
NSHumanReadableCopyright Copyright 2011, bitSpatter NSMainNibFile MainMenu NSPrincipalClass NSApplication
DMAppId 4d6c1e92d9340b04d7000000
#if !defined(MAC_APP_STORE) SUFeedURL http://iconfactory.com/appcasts/Flare/appcast.xml SUExpectsDSASignature
SUPublicDSAKeyFile dsa_pub.pem SUEnableAutomaticChecks
SUEnableSystemProfiling
SUFeedURL http://grabbox.devsoft.no/profiles/profileInfo2beta.php SUPublicDSAKeyFile dsa_pub.pem #endif
UTExportedTypeDeclarations
UTImportedTypeDeclarations
